name: Memory Machine
description:
Story:

Your a detective in a Small town. Your there to solve a small accident, The tool you have at disposal is only a memory scanner, But its a bit old so you can only see recent faces. Use some detective work to solve the case.

Controls:

R - Restart

Esc - Close

F11 - Fullscreen

Left/Right Arrows - Swap Target

Up Arrow - Memory Scan

Down Arrow - Selects Who Commited The Crime

Made By DynomiteWaffle in under 48hrs

P.S - This was my first game hope you enjoy it :)
